body: Besides this small update, I have a question. `mvapich2@1.9` (the oldest version that is checksummed) is not downloadable anymore. I was wondering if we should start having deprecation policies for software or not. I would be for removing the version and clean the recipe from everything that was `@1.9` specific, but would like to hear before what people think about it.
title: mvapich2: added version 2.3rc1 + variant to use alloca if available
